about_the_game:
Put your GPU to good use and discover our zombies' tendons and flaps of skin' fineness. You will be able to appreciate all the magnificience of decay thanks to ParadiZe's 4K textures pack. Download the 4K textures pack for free and prepare yourself to experience ParadiZe at its peak.

To use the 4K textures pack - 64Go of storage and an important vRAM are recommended. We advise you to check your setting before installing the textures pack to avoid a non-optimal experience.

content_descriptors.notes: This game features violence, blood and gore.

detailed_description:
Put your GPU to good use and discover our zombies' tendons and flaps of skin' fineness. You will be able to appreciate all the magnificience of decay thanks to ParadiZe's 4K textures pack. Download the 4K textures pack for free and prepare yourself to experience ParadiZe at its peak.

To use the 4K textures pack - 64Go of storage and an important vRAM are recommended. We advise you to check your setting before installing the textures pack to avoid a non-optimal experience.

name: Welcome to ParadiZe - 4K Textures

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 or AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060, 6 GB or AMD Radeon RX 5700, 8 GB or Intel Arc A750, 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 94 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Dutch
*languages with full audio support
